title: Multislacker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Power Tie- (Night) Target a player. If they use an ability that deals Attack or gives Defense, the strength of the Attack/Defense given is decreased by 1 tier.
Hyper Task!- (Night) [Cheat] You will deal a Powerful Attack to anyone who visits you tonight.
No Task!- (Day) [Cheat] If nobody has at least 3 votes at the end of today, you may choose two Cogs to give a Powerful autovest to. While they have this autovest, they are Overcharged. Overcharged Cogs cannot be targeted by this.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Power Tie can decrease an attack/defense to None.
-No Task! cannot be used less than 8 hours before the Day ends.
